metadataAttributes.Title: Songwriting: Writing, Arranging, and Producing Music Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Write, Arrange, and Produce Your Original Songs. Apply the tools and techniques of songwriting to bring your musical ideas to life.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Music, arranging, Producing, Songwriting, Music recording, Poetry, Melodic Hooks, Melody, Harmony, Writing, Audio Recording, Music Making,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Pat Pattison ,Scarlet Keys ,Sarah Brindell ,Bonnie Hayes ,Erin Barra ,
